lender.name: Annet & Hans
lender.loan_because: Because I care....
lender.occupational_info: International trading.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I am committed helping small business grow, and realize their full potential. Success of my clients fills me with joy and self-fulfillment. This special contribution is to reach beyond US and help other small business to grow and reach their goals.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's how the world should work
lender.occupational_info: Create opportunities for college students to learn about social justice and human capability

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: it`s a way of sharing...
lender.occupational_info: Lightworker (now-n);Any being dedicated to the cultivation of inner presence and the elevation of awareness in self and other selves. This being is called a lightworker and is an evolutionary step toward a state of "LightBeing"

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredits especially to fund women that want to start their own business. In the long run, investing in microcredits could be more effective than direct development aids.

lender.name: istmofre
lender.loan_because: In our days it is usually very hard to make big money,but at free casinos you make a lot of money in just a bit!
lender.occupational_info: free casino, gambling, casinos

lender.name: Roman
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive and impactfull difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Earlwin Fong
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am "lucky" to be in a westernised country with all the advantages. If I can help anyone else succeed in their goal, then I feel that I have accomplished something in my lifetime. Hopefully I can inspire others to do the same. To the people taking out loans, I wish you all the best in your endeavours!
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant offering solutions in the information, communication and technology sector. Am self employed and know how difficult it is to raise revenue in order to make a successful business sustainable and profitable.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe all people on earth should have the opportunity to work and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers to deliver helpful information to people.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Individuals build communities, communities build nations, I have had opportunities simply because of where I was born, lets give opportunities to all

lender.name: Kurt Petrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way that I can.

lender.name: 2nd Hour
lender.loan_because: We want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We sit in class and talk about stuff.

lender.name: Pierce
lender.loan_because: I loan for the good of our society.

lender.name: William Gaultier
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in the past and it's my time to pay back!
lender.occupational_info: Lead an international marketing agency

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it is a way to help people to have better lives! Lots of people very much about poverty and war in other countries, but don't know how to help. KIVA seems like a way for us to help because the money goes right to the people who need it, and because it helps them to build their own livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student. I study universities and adult education.

lender.name: CCS Business Math Class
lender.loan_because: I am a math teacher. This year I have a business math class, so I have asked the students to each bring in money so we can lend it to a business owner in another country.
lender.occupational_info: In our math class, we are learning different skills needed to run a business. We learn about wages, taxes, benefits, inventory, loans, bank accounts, and lots of other things.

lender.name: 3rd hour World History
lender.loan_because: We want to help others succeed
lender.occupational_info: We learn so we can solve future promlems.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to decrease poverty and to increase entrepreneurship at the same time!
lender.occupational_info: analyzing, designing and developing computersoftware

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupation: banker at small real estate private equity firm

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: Because what I do for others, will be done unto me. I love to help those in need, at some point we all need help. I'm glad i can help now...

lender.name: Alan & Gill
lender.loan_because: I would like those less fortunate than me to at least have a start to improve the lives of their family and hopefully neighbours.

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: micro lending through Kiva is a unique platform and opportunity for us to make a difference

lender.name: Adele
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunities in my life. I would like to pass on opportunities to others in hopes that their lives may be changed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants and hope to tutor young adults in Mexico

lender.name: Miu Group
lender.loan_because: Miu is all about helping small businesses develop. We provide consulting, training and design services for companies providing corporate quality consulting at a price small businesses can afford. We loved the idea of then re-investing some of the revenue to helping other small businesses grow. Kiva was the perfect match
lender.occupational_info: Consultation, training and design services for small businesses.

lender.name: ChristopherDeck
lender.loan_because: I loan in order to support economic development at the smallest of levels and where it counts... with one small business at a time. I've owned a small business myself and know that just a little capital can make a huge difference. Kiva stands in the place where traditional banks do not and/or there isn't a developed banking system available.

lender.name: Animmed
lender.loan_because: I try to start my business over 6 years, but because of financial and family situation I cannot worked on it. I would love to start my business in second chance better.
lender.occupational_info: Training animals, database of animals for photography, filming and care about home-less animals. Make better life for all animals and give them a chances become an artist. Special helping program for all owners and breeders.

lender.name: Rick & Betsy
lender.loan_because: What greater joy can there be than helping someone else succeed!
lender.occupational_info: Rick is involved in non-profit businesses and Betsy is a high school health and nutrition teacher

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I had a dream one night that this is something I should do. (seriously)
lender.occupational_info: I load luggage on and off airplanes, and move aircraft from one area to another to allow them to travel to another location.

lender.name: 5th Hour World History
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to help someone in need
lender.occupational_info: we learn in order to better our future

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that for the cost of a week's worth of Starbucks, I can help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 4 - 11 to sing, move and play recorder and percussion instruments.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupation: US Air Force Enlisted & Graduate School Student

lender.name: Tyler/Daniel
lender.loan_because: i want to.....(and my mom made me)

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to encourage deserving, risktaking women!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are struggling to live more productive and happy lives.

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because:
Money is like water, it has to flow somewhere. I also like the idea of a hand up rather than a hand out. I also like to think I have been lucky in my life and Kiva is good karma. I believe in the threefold rule, where you get back at least three times whatever you put out there.
May 2011 bring you all you hope for this year. 2010 was a busy one for me, and I expect more exciting things this year.
It feels like a big milestone for me. I made it to 25 loans on Kiva, helping folks in various countries around the world to make something of their lives through entrepreneurship. The neat thing is that I only put in enough funds for 6 loans, but as they repay the loans I get to re-loan it again and again. If I had donated the money it would have been the end of it, but in this case it is unending. I get to make a positive difference again and again.
If my kids were still young, I would have got them involved as it teaches them stuff like geography, lending, finance etc.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for various companies. I am looking for my next big challenge. In the mean time I like to kayak and hike and take photos and write.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in entrepreneurialship.
lender.occupational_info: I sell items for other people over the internet such as ebay and other sites. I focus on those who do not know how to do this and those who don't have the time to do this.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Anything to help fight global poverty is good in my book, and what a great idea. A large number of people spending a little each can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I get feature films, episodic television etc. onto physical media while always trying to make it look good. Disney, Fox and Paramount stuff.

lender.name: The Moeller Family
lender.loan_because: Many small steps - when added together - become life's journey.
lender.occupational_info: It's better to give then to receive - especially when you know it will make a difference.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Business owners have no time or money to build and market a website. "Webmaster Whacker" makes creating a website a joke. No need for a web designer! "Webmaster Whacker" also helps you market your site and get into Google. Effective and low cost!

lender.name: Joe & Carrie
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Carrie is in Graphic Design. Joe is a retired Psychologist

lender.name: Janet
lender.occupation: whole food educator, Juice Plus Representative

lender.name: Craig Sloat
lender.loan_because: I'd rather give money directly to the person(s) in need than any specific company. This way I know where the money is going and feel great at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: Schedule installs of software and computer equipment.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Many people in my life have loaned to me, in many ways, and blessed me. So now I am able to do this for my sisters and brothers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Helping children and teenagers find hope for their futures.

lender.name: The PSGS
lender.occupation: Group of friends from Brooklyn, NY
lender.loan_because: we have grown up in a world where responsibility to others -- strangers and friends alike -- is vanishing. We are a small group of optimistic people who hope to turn that trend around and make worthwhile differences in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: We work in many fields: education, arts, business, engineering, nursing, and law, to name a few. Each of us has unique skills to call his or her own.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference even if it's a small one.

lender.name: AliMo
lender.loan_because: sometimes the only thing you need for success is a chance...and hopefully my loan can help provide that opportunity for someone!

lender.name: Clay and Tash
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to live in this world together.

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and I chose Kiva because it's easy and I can see myself making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 6th grade.

lender.name: jen and adam
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and love to pay forward the blessings that I have received from all of those people who have helped me along the way...
lender.occupational_info: I create adventure travel retreats where people can enjoy time in the outdoors, rock climbing, hiking, and reconnecting with what is truly important in life.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: It's nice to know for the cost of one meal out for my family, I can change a life somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make graphics and special effects for television commercials. (And I have my own podcast on the side.)

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to live in a beautiful country like America, and I would like to help others.. My small contribution to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, as I need to learn.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to help people out.

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: Bobbi Jeppesen is a devoted fashionista with an unhealthy obsession with shoes and handbags. After many years of being a poor student she has become a savvy fashion shopper and often shares her tips on StyleCynics.com.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I hope to help repair the world and want to give back to those less privileged.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an office administrator in a small company.

lender.name: Tadhg
lender.loan_because: its so easy to make a difference for someone living in poverty...and its our responsibility as global citizens to do so.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: We all have to support each other for a healthy, stable, connected world.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and advertising for a museum and historical society. Getting the word out about exhibits, events, art work shows. I also volunteer for the Spokane International Film Festival.

lender.name: M.K.
lender.loan_because: Because I can and because I sincerely believe in Kiva's mission.

lender.name: David

lender.occupational_info: I lead a local group of people who follow Jesus Christ and want to share His love with others.

lender.name: Korrie
lender.loan_because: I care. I am inspired by the stories of people making a difference in the lives of their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of helping people to manage their finances in a way that allows them to achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.occupational_info: My business is a Dog/House sitting Company. I give my clients the peace of mind while they are away. I have been doing it on the side for ten years. I moved out of my house at 17yrs old. There is never enough time or money to get my business to the level I want. I believe in pay it forward so deeply.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help those who need it most, even with my modest means....
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for scheduling all special events on a community college campus, working with the public and college staff to coordinate use of facilities.

lender.name: Thuey
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Nala
lender.loan_because: I find it interesting that us rich Americans don't often think about the poor people in other countries. Some people that are considered poor still have food, water, and a place to sleep. Many people in other countries don't have acess to clean water and from that they can get really bad diseases. So I put my money in for the good of mankind. I also love to help!:)

lender.name: BUNLIMITZ PROMOTIONS
lender.loan_because: im a promoter that host events for different events to which i donate part of my proceeds to different organizations to help benefit family, youth organizations,senior homes and such
lender.occupational_info: HOSTIING SPECIAL EVENTS

lender.name: JAMES Q
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to give back in a financial way, but never trusted that my money would be used in the way I intended. As an entrepreneur, I know how much a loan can mean. Even though it's a tough economy for me, it's worse for others, and now is the time to make a difference. What goes around comes around, so I'm spreading more around.
lender.occupational_info: I work with others one-on-one to help them recover from a seemingly hopeless disease, as others have worked with me to help me keep my disease in remission. On a professional basis, I am a publisher.

lender.name: Angela

lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to have more than I need.

lender.name: Anye
lender.loan_because: For the first 22 years of my life, I worked extremely hard with a lot of challenges and limitations, in the farms, woods, local markets selling vegetables, fruits and anything money can buy. Hardly grew in any scale. I understand how tough it is to grow a business in a remote market place without the badly needed financial resources. I just want to help in my own little way because I've been there and know how tough it is. Now that I'm a little priviledged, I just want to be a part of the solution in my own small way. Thank Kiva for this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse/ physician assistant. I work mostly with cancer patients.

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I make films.

lender.name: Teeter Auto Transport
lender.loan_because: God has truely blessed me and my family and I want to pass on that blessing to those that need a helping hand but are not looking for a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I own a automobile transportation company. We move vehicles all over the United States, Canada, and most international ports.

lender.name: Big Al
lender.loan_because: greater abundance for those with less raises the tide for us all.
lender.occupational_info: filmmaker, internet entrepreneur, talk show host

lender.name: charmaine
lender.loan_because: I believe we ae here to help each other.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: Giving an opportunity to someone across the world in an instant is one of the most amazing innovations of technology. It would be shameful after the opportunities I've been given in my life, not to do what I can for someone else.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I just got out of the military. I am a student now, living off of the money I saved.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to know where charitable funds are being used. Kiva is a very efficient way for those of us who are fortunate enough to have surplus resources to help because it uses the money many times over.
lender.occupational_info: I work on privately funded public infrastructure projects in Latin America, North America and Europe

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to get all the help I have ever needed - great to be able to help others in this simple way.
lender.occupational_info: Implement business software systems for small companies

lender.occupational_info: i work in my ministore 16 hours a day,

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because:
With even small loans one can make a great difference to the lives of people, especially those in the poorest areas in the world. Hard work on their part deserves to be rewarded.
As my logo indicates - its one world and one humanity. The betterment of one person adds to the betterment of the world as a whole!
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of this beautiful planet with its One Humanity! So I give a little of the abundance I have .... and hope to make a difference in peoples lives and their families.

lender.name: Cristel
lender.loan_because: Although i have a business and want to expand it but due to lack of capital I can`t operate well. Need for me to have enough capital so that i can rolling it well.
lender.occupational_info: I want to have enough capital for me to work well in my business. That i have reserve capital so that i can work well and of coarse hard to work if lack of capital need to strve as you can but very hard.

lender.name: Rachel
